name: 'In The Room' Trivia Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What comedy duo performed at Zoey's birthday party?
questions.explanation:
Penn and Teller.

	Zoey's party took place in the East room of the White House. Toby, Josh, and Charlie were three people present for the party and saw Penn and Teller burn a flag inside the Bill of Rights.

questions.text: Who did Will want running the Vice President's campaign for President?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Will told Josh that once they got the Vice President into office, they could make him the President they wanted him to be.

questions.text: The Vice President was against flag burning.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Will had the Vice President put out a statement saying he was against flag burning and the Vice President said he signed every bill that came through the senate banning flag burning.

questions.text:
Who said this?
"Did they just burn an American flag inside the White House?"
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby and Josh were watching the trick from the back of the room. When Toby saw the trick, he asked Josh the above question and Josh said "Mhmh."

Yes.

	The President said he loved shrimp so that's how they decided that's how they were going to open up the summit in China.

questions.text: Where did Penn Gillette tell Josh he went to school?
questions.explanation:
Clown college.

	Penn talked so emphatically about the law and freedoms that Josh wanted to know if he went to law school. Penn told him not law school, but clown school.

questions.text: Who played Republican Senator Arnold Vinick?
questions.explanation:
Alan Alda.

	Alan Alda joins the show in this episode as Republican Senator and Presidential nominee Arnold Vinick.

questions.text: How late was the plane from taking off from Andrews Air Force Base?
questions.explanation:
48 minutes.

	Josh and Donna had a bet going on to see how late the plane would be from taking off. Josh said it would be under forty minutes late.

questions.text: How long did Donna say Josh had to talk her out of voting for Vinick?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	When Donna said this, she and Josh were watching Vinick announce that he was running for President of the United States.

questions.text: The President's MS caused paralysis of his body while he was on the plane to China.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The President right hand was paralyzed during the first half of the show, but he didn't tell anyone. While on the plane, the President's body became paralyzed. By the end of the show, he could move his hands, but not his legs.
